title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 55.5 - Burning, pulverizing or shredding of obligations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 55.5 - Burning, pulverizing or shredding of obligations

State Regulations

Should obligations be destroyed in the manner set forth in
subdivision (b) or (c) of section
55.3
of this Part, or in the manner
set forth in section
55.4
of this Part, they shall be
burned, pulverized or shredded within one year from the date of such
destruction. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
55.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
